text: Uye (rangarira) apo Abrahamu akati: “Tenzi vangu! Ndiratidzei kuti munopa sei hupenyu kune avo vakafa.” Vakati (Allah): “Asi hautendi?” Akati (Abrahamu): “Hongu, ndinotenda, asi kuti moyo wangu uve unogutsikana mukutenda.” Vakati (Allah): “Tora shiri ina wodziita kuti dzikujairire (wova unodzicheka zvibande zvibande), uye wova unotsveta chibande chadzo pagomo rimwe nerimwe, uye wova unodzidaidza, dzichauya kwauri nokukasika. Uye ziva kuti zvirokwazvo Allah ndivo mukuru-mukuru, vane hungwaru hwakanyanya.”
